class.name: b4a.flm.archiverplus.ArchiverPlusZip
class.event: ZipProgression(Operation As Int, FileName As String, PercentDone As Float)
ZipResult(Result As Int, ErrorMsg As String)

method.name: CreateSplitZip
method.comment: Compresses the given folder and its subfolders into a split zip archive. A split zip archive is made of multiple parts that are limited to a specified size. It cannot be modified with Add or Remove functions. An exception is thrown if the zip archive already exists. FolderToZip: path of the folder to zip. ArchivePath: location of the zip archive. SplitLength: maximum length in bytes of each part. Has to be more than 65536 bytes. EventPrefix: prefix of the "ZipProgression" and "ZipResult" events.

method.name: UnZipFile
method.comment: Extracts a specific file from the given zip archive to the destination path. ArchivePath: location of the archive to unzip. FileName: the file to unzip. The path to the file is relative. DestPath: location where to unzip the file. EventPrefix: prefix of the "ZipProgression" and "ZipResult" events.

method.name: CancelAllZipTasks
method.comment: Tries to cancel all zip/unzip tasks in progress.

method.name: UnZip
method.comment: Extracts all the files from the given zip archive to the destination path. ArchivePath: location of the archive to unzip. DestPath: location where to unzip the files. EventPrefix: prefix of the "ZipProgression" and "ZipResult" events.

method.name: DecryptZipWithArray
method.comment: Sets the password to be used for decryption. UTF8: Whether to use the UTF-8 charset (True) or the ISO-8859-1 charset (False).

method.name: UnZipToStream
method.comment: Writes the contents of the specified file of a zip archive to an output stream. ArchivePath: location of the zip archive. FileName: the file to unzip. The path to the file is relative. Stream: the output stream. This stream is closed after the last byte is written.

method.name: ListZipEntries
method.comment: Returns a list containing the properties of all files of the specified zip archive. Each item of this list is an ArchiverZipInfo object. Example: Dim lstEntries As List = Arc.ListZipEntries(ArchiveFolder & "MyArchive.zip") For i = 0 To lstEntries.Size - 1 Dim ZipInfo As ArchiverZipInfo = lstEntries.Get(i) Log(ZipInfo.FileName & ": Compressed=" & ZipInfo.CompressedSize & " / Uncompressed=" & ZipInfo.UncompressedSize & " / CRC32= " & ZipInfo.CRC32) Log(" Last modification=" & DateTime.Date(ZipInfo.LastModFileTime) & " " & DateTime.Time(ZipInfo.LastModFileTime)) Next

method.name: AddStreamToZip
method.comment: Creates a new entry in the specified zip archive with the content of the given InputStream. Stream: the input stream. FileName: a file name for the new entry. ArchivePath: location of the zip archive.

method.name: DecryptZipWithString
method.comment: Sets the password to be used for decryption. For security reasons, Strings are not recommended to store passwords (http://docs.oracle.com/javase/1.5.0/docs/guide/security/jce/JCERefGuide.html#PBEEx). You should use an array of bytes instead and set the password with DecryptZipWithArray.

method.name: AddFolderToZip
method.comment: Adds a folder and its subfolders to the specified zip archive. If the zip archive does not exist, it is created. FolderPath: path of the folder to add. ArchivePath: location of the zip archive. EventPrefix: prefix of the "ZipProgression" and "ZipResult" events.

method.name: RemoveFileFromZip
method.comment: Removes a file from the specified zip archive. Throws an exception if the file was not found. ArchivePath: location of the zip archive. FilePath: path of the file to remove. This path is relative. EventPrefix: prefix of the "ZipProgression" and "ZipResult" events.

method.name: RemoveFilesFromZip
method.comment: Removes a list of files from the specified zip archive. Throws an exception if the file was not found. ArchivePath: location of the zip archive. FileNames: list of the files to remove. Paths to the files are relative. EventPrefix: prefix of the "ZipProgression" and "ZipResult" events.

method.name: CountZipEntries
method.comment: Returns the number of entries in the specified zip archive.

method.name: ListSplitZipFiles
method.comment: Returns a list of all parts of the specified split zip archive.

method.name: EncryptZipWithArray
method.comment: Sets the encryption properties and forces ZipEncryption to True. EncryptionMethod: One of the ZIP_ENC_ constants. AESKeyStrength: Either ZIP_AES_STRENGTH_128 or ZIP_AES_STRENGTH_256. ZIP_AES_STRENGTH_192 cannot be used for encryption. This parameter is ignored if the encryption method is not AES. Password: An array of bytes containing the password to be used for encryption. Cannot be empty.

method.name: AddFileToZip
method.comment: Adds a file to the specified zip archive. If the zip archive does not exist, it is created. FilePath: path of the file to add. ArchivePath: location of the zip archive. EventPrefix: prefix of the "ZipProgression" and "ZipResult" events.

method.name: UnZipFiles
method.comment: Extracts a list of files from the given zip archive to the destination path. ArchivePath: location of the archive to unzip. FileNames: list of the files to unzip. Paths to the files are relative. DestPath: location where to unzip the files. EventPrefix: prefix of the "ZipProgression" and "ZipResult" events.

method.name: EncryptZipWithString
method.comment: Sets the encryption properties and forces ZipEncryption to True. EncryptionMethod: One of the ZIP_ENC_ constants. AESKeyStrength: Either ZIP_AES_STRENGTH_128 or ZIP_AES_STRENGTH_256. ZIP_AES_STRENGTH_192 cannot be used for encryption. This parameter is ignored if the encryption method is not AES. Password: The password to be used for encryption. Cannot be empty. For security reasons, Strings are not recommended to store passwords (http://docs.oracle.com/javase/1.5.0/docs/guide/security/jce/JCERefGuide.html#PBEEx). You should use an array of bytes instead and set the password with EncryptZipWithArray.

method.name: AddFilesToZip
method.comment: Adds a list of files to the specified zip archive. If the zip archive does not exist, it is created. FileNames: list of the files to add. ArchivePath: location of the zip archive. EventPrefix: prefix of the "ZipProgression" and "ZipResult" events.

method.name: MergeSplitZip
method.comment: Merges the specified split zip archive into a single zip file without the need to extract the files. SplitZip: location of the split zip archive NewArchive: location of the combined archive EventPrefix: prefix of the "ZipProgression" and "ZipResult" events.

method.name: UnZipFile2
method.comment: Extracts a specific file from the given zip archive and changes its name. ArchivePath: location of the archive to unzip. FileName: the file to unzip. The path to the file is relative. DestPath: location where to unzip the file. NewName: new name of the extracted file. EventPrefix: prefix of the "ZipProgression" and "ZipResult" events.

method.name: GetZipEntry
method.comment: Returns an ArchiverZipInfo object containing the properties of the specified file. ArchivePath: location of the zip archive. FileName: the file whose properties are requested.

property.name: ZipCompression
property.comment: Gets or sets whether the files are compressed (true) or stored (false).

property.name: ZipExecutionMode
property.comment: Gets or sets the execution mode of zip/unzip tasks (one of the ZIP_EXECMODE_ constants). SYNCHRONOUS: waits for the end of the task (default mode). ASYNCHRONOUS: does not wait for the end of the task. The function returns immediately and the task continues in the background. Check ZipResultCode to know whether the task has ended. In both modes, do not try to handle views from within the events.

property.name: RootFolderInZip
property.comment: Gets or sets the root folder in the zip archive.

property.name: ZipResultCode
property.comment: Returns a result code (one of the ZIP_RESULT_ constants) when a task is done, or ZIP_RESULT_WORKING when the task is still in progress.

property.name: ZipCompressionLevel
property.comment: Gets or sets the compression level. From 1: lowest compression level but higher speed of compression. To 9: highest compression level but low speed. Setting a compression level forces ZipCompression to True.

property.name: ZipEncryption
property.comment: Gets or sets whether the encryption is enabled.

property.name: ZipEncryptionMethod
property.comment: Returns the encryption method (one of the ZIP_ENC_ constants) set with EncryptZipWith.

property.name: EncryptionMethod
property.comment: Returns the encryption method (one of the ZIP_ENC_ constants).

property.name: UncompressedSize
property.comment: Returns the uncompressed size in bytes.

property.name: LastModFileTime
property.comment: Returns the timestamp of the file.

property.name: CompressionMethod
property.comment: Returns the compression method (one of the ZIP_COMP_ constants).

property.name: CompressedSize
property.comment: Returns the compressed size in bytes.
